    Alumni

    Amar Sinha

    Thoughtworks, Bangalore

    Amar's dad runs a small shop in Guwahati, making college an unafforable option for him. He joined NavGurukul to learn at his own terms, and is currently a full-stack developer - Javascript, Java and Python being primary language of his interest.
